murach.business

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • murach.business.Product

  • public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    The Product class defines a product and is used by the LineItem and ProductDB classes.
    Version:
    8.0
    Author:
    Joel Murach

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Product()
      Creates a Product with default values.
